casebody.data:
Thursday, June 24, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-2626. Krain v. State Med. Bd. of Ohio.

Franklin App. No. 97APE08-981. This cause came on for further consideration upon appellant’s motion for stay pending appeal to the United States Supreme Court. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that appellant’s motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

Moyer, C.J., Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
